name: BlackBox (itch) (hdmmY)
description:
Hacking into the Black Box!

Black Box is a cyberpunk action game. You are a console cowboy and daily life is taking missions from the dark web, hack into the target company's system to steal some information.

The process of hacking is not easy, security robots will destroy anyone who tries to hack into the firewall. Your only weapon is your sword, but your CPU can overload to an amazing speed so that you can slow down time in some parse.

Black Box is made as a student undergraduate graduation project by a team of 2 students from HUST(China). We start making this game in Nov 2018, and we still in progress. 

Features

+ Sword vs Gun
+ Time slow and inertial movement
+ Fighting with smart robots

Useful Infomation

+ The game plays better with an Xbox gamepad.
+ Backstab attack will destroy an enemy immediately.
